Html:
Hello, is it possible to insert directly a row into a sheet like on mysql(INSERT)?
I mean without define the row number, just add one on the bottom. If yes how?

Also is it possible to read a row like with mysql (SELECT)?

I know could be a silly question, just would like to know if i can avoid using mysql!:D


Thank you,

Luca
INSERT and SELECT statements as such are not supported. It is however perfectly possible to create your own functions which store and retrieve data from PHPExcel on a row basis.
